title: #193 - Jake Paul Arrested For Rioting & The Karen Invasion
description:
On this episode of the H3 Podcast Ethan, Hila, and the boys in da back talk about the recent civil unrest throughout the US, Jake Paul's looting adventure, Karens flipping out over having to wear a mask, some Keemstar drama followup, and a whole lot more!
  
   NYPD responds by looking themselves look like children
